name: StreamOnwithJimWilliams
0:
”Alexa, open Jim Williams Podcast”
”Alexa, start Jim Williams Podcast”
”Alexa, ask Jim Williams Podcast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: jim williams podcast
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Seven-time Emmy Award winner Jim Williams welcomes the top executives from your favorite networks and stars from your favorite shows to his weekly chat. We also introduce you to some of the newest cutting edge streaming networks as well as some yet to be discovered stars. Don't miss a single episode of Stream On.

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Jim Williams Podcast to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Jim Williams Podcast to start from first episode”
